description:
Though Kokona works hard, lately character idols have been getting all the attention, making her feel anxious about her own lack of personality. One day, Kokona arrives at school with a forced character. However, none of her characters seem to work. When Kokona attempts a catch phrase character during an interview with a marathon runner on a sports program, the athlete becomes furious with her. Tsukasa and Komugi reach out to Kokona while she`s feeling down, and Kokona resolves to take a certain action!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hashire Kokona, Ai to Namida no Marathon Taikai
Run, Kokona: Marathon of Love and Tears
走れここな, 愛と涙のマラソン大会
